lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Hello and welcome to your 3-day job trial at Blind Box. Co.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: The purpose of this trial is to determine if you are suitable for the position.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: If you earn enough money during the trial period, we will offer you a full-time position.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: As I am sure you know, Blind Box. Co. is a postage service with a strict no-package opening policy.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Due to this, we get some strange characters trying to send all types of contraband.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Your job is simple: approve legal packages and decline packages that contain contraband.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Our metal detector, x-ray scanner, and chemical detector are at your disposale.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: But be warned, those devices are not cheap and each use will cost you.

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.line: Also remember, the detectors do not tell the full story. Keep your wits about you.
